msg: Fixes the empty content_length problem -- patch submitted by Gene Wadleigh.

author: horwat
msg: Changed to a more meaningful and unique variable name.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add unit tests to verify that <jsp:params> is not allowed inside <jsp:incluce>

author: horwat
msg: TagLibraryValidator update. Reflect changes in the JSP 1.2 PFD specification. Validation now returns an error list.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add unit tests to prove that servlet lifecycle is handled correctly - i.e.
init() is called exactly once before the service() method is invoked, and
the first call can be either a GET or a POST.
These tests indicate that the error reported by Bugzilla #206 does *not*
